live_table_notification.before_script: /** * Optional script to set variables or cancel notification * global variables * current is the current GlideRecord object * changedFields is an ArrayList of fields changed on submit, use changedFields.contains('fieldname') to check for change * set answer = false to cancel the notification * set profileSource to a GlideRecord to define the profile that is posting the message * set profileID to a live_profile sys_id to define the profile that is posting the message, by default it is the current record. Overrides profileSource if specified. * set any variable name and access the value in the message by using ${myVariableName} */
